title: Man in Sport: An International Exhibition of Photography
description:
This exhibition contained 642 photographs, focusing on many aspects of life in sport - the emotions generated, the physical consequences, the participation and the effort. 
Photographers included: George Silk, Jerry Cooke, Mark Kauffman, Toni Frissell, Gerry Cranham, T. Tanuma, Hy Peskin, Art Rickerby, Horst Baumann, Robert Riger, Stuart C. Apte, Carolo Bavagnoli, Peter Biro, Barry Bishop, Brian Brake, Elgin Ciampi, Lucien Clergue, Yvan Dalain, Robert Daley, Loomis Dean, David Douglas Duncan, Walter M. Edwards, J. Fitzpatrick, Howard Friedman, Joern Gerdts, Phillipp Giegel, Nawang Gomub, Robert Gomel, Robert Goodman, Ernst Haas, Robert Halmi, Daryl Heikes, Walter Iooss, Jr., Jim Kelly, Lasse Klaebo, Marvin Koner, Neil Leifer, George Long, Fred W. Lyons, Jay Maisel, Henry Manney, Richard Meek, Don Morley, Gianfranco Moroldi, Marvin Newman, Walter Osborne, Hal Power, Ken Regan, Fred Roe, Morris Rosenfeld, Paul Ryan, Herb Scharfman, Flip Schulke, Brian Seed, John Severson, Barton Silverman, Aage Sorensen, Ron Stoner, J.B. Sutherland, Boris Svetlanov, M.D. Thompson, Pete Turner, Jan Van Deurs, Brice Weisman, Noel Werret, Peter Winants, and Ylla.

input: Man in Sport: An International Exhibition of Photography
